title: "Machine Learning Can Help The Insurance Industry Throughout The Process Lifecycle"
excerpt: "Not all insurance is alike. Life insurance and automobile insurance are not (as far as I know) the same thing. There are many similar processes, but data and numerous flows can be different. Machine learning (ML) is being applied to multiple aspects of insurance practice."
